Amazon on Thursday filed a lawsuit against two influencers and nearly a dozen merchants for allegedly marketing and selling counterfeit goods like the knockoff Gucci belt pictured above.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Brazil's health regulator says China's Sinovac can resume Covid-19 vaccine trial after suspension - CNBC
articles.description: The trial had been suspended due to a study subject's death that was registered in Sao Paulo as a suicide.
articles.content: Brazil health regulator Anvisa on Wednesday allowed resumption of late-stage Brazilian clinical trials for China's Sinovac Covid-19 vaccine, which had been suspended due to a study subject's death th… [+2264 chars]
